description: If you receive an OSR file, you can double-click it to see the replay summary and watch the replay (assuming the osu! software is installed).

Replays can be saved at the end of a game by clicking the save replay or export replay option. OSR files are saved to the \​Replays\​ directory of the osu! software installation. You can copy these replays and send them to friends over email or another file transfer program.
